LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_DoubleSword.label: Double Bladed Energy Sword
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_DoubleSword.description: Two Energy Swords combined together to make a double energy sword, absolute badass until an unarmed assistant disarms you or a clown slips you.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_EnergySword.label: Energy Sword
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_EnergySword.description: A small metal hilt that projects a blade of pure energy, the most popular and only choice among operatives who favor a melee approach.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_EnergySword.tools.edge.label: edge
